item.title: WordPress Hosting Made Cheap and Easy
item.description:
A lot of dedicated bloggers and website creators opt for WordPress to power their websites. It’s adaptable and boasts a large community of developers who create themes and plugins. If you’re new to WordPress, you can start with the online version to learn the basics. However, you’ll eventually want the control and scalability that comes with hosting WordPress yourself. Now you need to make a decision: Do you want to host WordPress the easy way or the hard way?..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/wordpress-hosting-made-cheap-and-easy/

item.title: Uncovering the untapped potential of business cards
item.description:
Although 62% of surveyed individuals believe business cards remain important, their full potential often goes unrealized. On average, respondents accumulated 864 business cards throughout their careers. Despite the rise of digital tools, 90% of those surveyed haven’t digitized all their collected business cards. Inaccurate data entry poses a significant concern, with 70% citing it as a challenge when digitizing cards. Individuals who shared contacts within their company saw over double the referral business compared to those who didn’t...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/uncovering-the-untapped-potential-of-business-cards/

item.title: Hosted SharePoint For Content and Collaboration
item.description:
Large businesses use Microsoft SharePoint for managing content, documents, and collaborative work. Small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) could also reap the benefits of SharePoint’s advanced automation, but often lack the resources for significant IT infrastructure expansion. Fortunately, Integra Telecom now offers Microsoft SharePoint 2010 as a hosted solution. This makes cloud computing practical for SMBs. Using Integra as your SharePoint provider offers two advantages: access to their robust data center and computing platform, along with dedicated high-performance connectivity through their fiber optic network...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hosted-sharepoint-for-content-and-collaboration/
